TestSuit.Name: Device Management

Test.Name: Correct response with empty key list
Incorrect GetAllKeys strucrure: KeyID mandatory element is absent
Incorrect GetAllKeys strucrure: KeyStatus mandatory element is absent
GetAllKeys: without optional elements
Test.Description: DUT sends correct response: GetAllKeys response contains only mandatory elements

Test.Name: No Ok status during operation dely time
Test.Description: Set Operation delay to 30 s Check that TT will send PM request during operation delay time Check that TT will delete the key at the end of the test

Test.Name: Corrupt status during operation dely time
Test.Description: Set Operation delay to 30 s DUT sends corrupt status Check that TT will delete the key at the end of the test

Test.Name: DUT doesn't return KeyID after key creation
Test.Description: GetAllKeys doesn't contain jast created KeyID

Test.Name: DUT doesn't return old KeyID after key creation
Test.Description: GetAllKeys contains jast created KeyID but doesn't contain old KeyID

Test.Name: DUT returns excess KeyID after key creation
Test.Description: GetAllKeys contains KeyID which wasn't presented in initial key list
